answers.answer: Wait what does having your due date wrong have to do with that?Also the down syndrome test has a lot of false positives which is why most women opt out of doing them. And why women don't let doctors keep testing after they find out there's a chance. Just know there is a chance but its not like you won't love your baby anyway.
My ob daid if they are off on my last due date it ny make my test abnormal and yeah i heard they are more wrong then right . I have a scheduled 3-d ultrasound scheduled for monday though.
Yeah even though mine didn't come back abnormal I wish I didn't do it I hear too many false positives its not worth the stress.
My doctor told me the same thing the other day. I just pray it was a false positive. I send my prayers to you as well
The same exact thing happened to me and i couldn't sleep or eat i was really stressed and for no reason cause everything ended up being okay. Just like you and your baby are gonna be just fibe.
Thank you so much i feel better knowing  it might not be true .
I dont even know why they scare us like this .
Just stay positive and know that your baby will always be okay.

They aren't trying to scare you they are legally obligated to tell you if any tests come back abnormal. My son had a bright spot on his heart at 13 weeks and my doctor said it was a soft marker for down syndrome. The bright spot went away. Also the blood test only tells you if you're more likely to have a baby with down syndrome, not that your baby definitely has it or not. Try not to stress out about it too much.  :)
I know like 3 different girls where they told them the exact same thing and they came out 100% healthy don't get stressed out my prayers go out to you and your little one!

My 3rd daughter came back with a possibility. Come to find out my due date was off. My 5th child,  the triple screen & sono didn't show any indication that something was wrong. We were surprised at birth that my daughter had Down syndrome and sever heart complications. She is absolutely amazing!!!! She graduated to Heaven 1 1/2 years ago,  right before her 1st birthday. I'd literally cut offboth my legs to hold her here on earth again. I pray your child is amazing health!! If your child does have Down syndrome, just know there is so much support, love and new acceptance for children with disabilities.  I feel it is a privilege she's mine and I can't wait to see her again!!! :)

A lot of false positives hun, but also some that really are positive. So just know there is a possibility no matter what that test says. There is always that chance :/ it's so scary! Honestly, I would love my son either way a disorder or not, I just pray that he will be a healthy boy and live a happy life. No one ever hopes their child has Down syndrome or some kind of disability. It's just God's plan. I will pray though that your test is a false positive and that your baby is strong and healthy!
Thank youn and i am so sorry to hear that. I hope everything is going pretty good for u right now.
Your right thanks swetie and i hope all is well with you.
My friend that I worked with was tested positive and shes a doctor! God has a plan. Pray

Thanks! I am so sorry for your loss @MissyMorgan5. I cannot imagine losing my son. I lost my nephew who was born at 26 weeks 10 days after he was born. My sister had preeclampsia and she nearly died from it. Hardest thing I myself had ever dealt with and he was was nephew. It takes a strong person to be able to cope with the loss of a child. Infant/child's death is so devastating. He was born with a cleft pallet. And only weighed 1lb 2oz. And about the size of a palm. But he was beautiful and he was so loved. I'd give anything for my nephew to be alive today. But God works in mysterious ways. God bless you though Mommas!

question: My doctor called me today and told me that my bloodwork came back abnormal and it is a possibility that my baby may be born with down syndrome. Ive really been stressing it but that said they may just have my due date wrong. Anyone else have/had this problem ?
title: Down Syndrome Possibility ?
